dict.acceptation: 坚固的，坚牢的；坚定的，坚决的；严格的；确定的；
商号，商行；公司；企业；工作集体；

sent.orig: Firm words, air shower and broadband are three major key products of the firm net operator.
sent.trans: 固话、小灵通和宽带是固网运营商的三大核心产品。

sent.orig: Law Firm terminated by a practicing certificate issued by the department canceled the firm's practicing certificate.
sent.trans: 律师事务所终止的，由颁发执业证书的部门注销该律师事务所的执业证书。

sent.orig: Each firm do as the others do to prevent another firm from getting an unanticipated advantage.
sent.trans: 每个企业都必须与其他企业亦步亦趋，以防另一个企业取得夺人之先的优势。

sent.orig: We examine firm-level economic performance such as firm value, accounting performance and year-round stock return.
sent.trans: 企业绩效主要考察了企业价值、会计业绩和年度股票收益。

sent.orig: The firm activities always serve the firm goals.
sent.trans: 企业生产总是服务于一定的企业目标。
